description: Information relating to how a biomaterial was preserved and/or stored over a period of time.
title: preservation_storage

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

storage_method.description: The method by which a biomaterial was stored.
storage_method.comment: Refers to how a biomaterial was stored after preservation or before another protocol was used.

storage_time.description: Length of time the biomaterial was stored for in Storage time units.

storage_time_unit.description: The unit in which Storage time is expressed.

preservation_method.description: The method by which a biomaterial was preserved or not.
enum: cryopreservation of live cells in liquid nitrogen
preservation_method.comment: Refers to the use of chemicals, cold, or other means to prevent or retard biological or physical deterioration of a biomaterial.
